full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS MDZAD PA'I 'BUM BSANGS BEEd'URYA'I SNGON PO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022B (CES 'BUM BSANGS BEEt'URYA'I SNGON MO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG 'DI NI, RJE KHRI SRONG LDE'U BRTZAN RGYAL PO'I SKABS SU, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS, ,DPAL BSAM YAS KYI BTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I TSE, LHA SRIN LDE BRGYAD LA SOGS PA NAG PHYOGS PA RNAMS KYI 'DUL BA'I CHED DU MDZAD DU, ,DE'I RJES SU GANGS CAN BOD KYIS LA NAD RIMS DANG DAL YAMS SANG SER BTZA' MU GE THAN PA LA SOGS PA BYUNG BA'I DUS SU, ,DE DAG THAMS CAD KYI ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS 'DI SHING DU MCHOG GO ZER @023A *, ,GSUM NGES, KHYAD PAR MYUR DU BRTZE DON GRUB, ,BSTAN BSRUNG CHOS SKYONG 'KHOR TSOGS YIN, ,MI PHYED DAD PA'I MOS GUS BYA, ,PHUN TSOGS DUS BZANG ZLA RE LA, ,YAR NGO'I NYIN 'PHROD GZA' SKAR DAG ,LHA YI 'BUM BSANGS 'DI DAG GI ,RGYUN DU BYAS PAR PHAN YON NI, ,NAD DANG GDON RNAMS THAMS CAD DAG , RIMS TSAD DAL YAMS MED PA YI, ,DGRA DANG CHOM RKUN CE SPYANG SOGS, ,STOGS KYIS 'PHROD RNAMS BZLOG PAR 'GYUR, ,TSE RING NAD MED BDE SKYID LDAN, ,CHOS SRID RGYUN DU 'GRUB PA DANG, ,NOR DANG LONGS SPYOD 'PHEL BA YIN, ,BKRA SHIS DGE MTSAN RGYAS PAR 'GYUR, ,SPEL MI BAR GYI SBYIN BDAG NI, ,BYA RIGS CHOS KYIS DBANG PHYUG GIS, ,THUB BSTAN LANG TSO BDO BA'I THANG, ,SUM PA BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYA BAS, ,SOR MOS ZLOS GAR BSGYUR LAS SGRUB, ,DGE 'DIS 'JIG RTEN KHAMS KUN TU, ,PHAN BDE LO 'DAB RGYAS PA DANG, ,BDAG DANG MKHA' MNYAM SEMS CAN GYI, ,MI MTHUN PHYOGS RNAMS RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
